subSections.title: Readings
Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|瓜%田に履を納れず、李%下に冠を正さず|か%でん に くつ を いれず、り%か に かんむり を たださず}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|かぶり|yomi=k}}
Likely a shift from ''kagafuri'' above, ancient ''kagapuri''. {{rfv-etymology|ja}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かむり}}

# [[headdress]], [[crown]]
# distance from the [[tunnel]]'s [[roof]] to the surface directly above it
# {{lb|ja|poetry}} first (traditionally, five) [[mora]]e of a [[haiku]], etc.; specifically, the first verse or line of a poem

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|こうぶり|yomi=k}}
A shift from ''kagafuri'' above, ancient ''kagapuri''.<ref name=DJR>{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Compounds
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|初%冠|うい%こうぶり|crowning a boy for the first time at a coming-of-age ceremony​}}

Etymology 6
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|さか|sort=さか}}
Clipping of {{ja-r|鶏%冠|と%'''さか'''}}. {{rfv-etymology|ja}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|さか}}

# [[comb]], [[crest]] (of a bird, particularly a [[chicken]] or [[pheasant]]); [[cockscomb]]
